channel.title: Invalid username/ or password
channel.description: im using moparclassic. I try to log in and it says invalid username/ or password. im using MySQL, persistenceAuth. any ideas?

[quote=“matty matt, post:7, topic:507902”]because i would post on here and try to get help then it would be prolonged over weeks. I’ll just start over. If someone would like to help me id appreciate it… just trying to get a server online to play[/quote]I’ve posted within a few hours each time… The first reply to your thread was within 30 minutes.

Also, even if you weren’t delusional, taking a few hours to reply is no reason to be an ungrateful little shit.

item.title: Invalid username/ or password
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:3, topic:507902”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=626137.msg4259276#msg4259276 date=1363294523]

[quote author=matty matt link=topic=626137.msg4259267#msg4259267 date=1363293391]im using moparclassic. I try to log in and it says invalid username/ or password.
im using MySQL, persistenceAuth. any ideas?[/quote]You didn’t create the character, or stored the password incorrectly would be my two best guesses.
[/quote]
ok i created the character, so can you help me on password part…i have a register.php and i have it set as md5.($password)… where else do i have to fix?

loveing sick of waiting for people to respond on here someone just put it out there… .wtf i hate the people here[/quote]If you’re going to have that shitty of an attitude, you can go fuck yourself.

Read full topic

fucking sick of waiting for people to respond on here someone just put it out there… .wtf i hate the people here
